ComicInfo.Summary:
The vampire god U'tlun'ta has awoken from his long slumber and turned the Empire State Building and its trapped victims within into a massive feeding ground... each body consumed slowly bringing back his full power. With the rescue S.W.A.T. team decimated upon contact with the vampire horde, and Terry and his friends trapped 80 floors up, is there any hope for escape?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Charlie Adlard | 1 | B | Cover B | Stefano Gaudiano | 2 | C | Cover C (King Kong Parody) | Diego Bernard | 3 | D | Sketch Cover D | Charlie Adlard | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Glow In the Dark Cover E | Guilherme Balbi | 5 |
